name: Nor_Fik
content:
Nor Fik was the lead negotiator for the Colicoids who sought total control of the spice-processing operations on Nar Shaddaa prior the Clone Wars.
Fik journeyed to Rorak 5 to meet with the slave crime-lord Krayn, who ran the spice factories, in order to complete final negotiations. The Colicoids brought with them the slave trader and advisor "Bakleeda" , who would inspect Krayn's slave-operated factories.
Later confronted by Kenobi and Siri Tachi, Nor Fik was convinced to allow a slave revolt so that the Jedi could ensure Krayn's illegal practices of operation on Nar Shaddaa were shut down permanently.
